DDescription.description: Can be used as an alternative to SourceFileName. Only one of SourceFile and SourceFileName is used. SourceFile takes precedence.
Can be used as an alternative to SourceFile. Only one of SourceFile and SourceFileName is used. SourceFile takes precedence.
Can be used as an alternative to TargetFileName. Only one of TargetFile and TargetFileName is used. TargetFile takes precedence.
Can be used as an alternative to TargetFile. Only one of TargetFile and TargetFileName is used. TargetFile takes precedence.

Can be used as an alternative to TargetDirectoryName. Only one of TargetDirectory and TargetDirectoryName is used. TargetDirectory takes precedence. Used in conjunction with TargetFile or TargetFileName.

Full path of directory. Can be used as an alternative to TargetDirectory. Only one of TargetDirectory and TargetDirectoryName is used. TargetDirectory takes precedence. Used in conjunction with TargetFile or TargetFileName.

Can be used as an alternative to SourceDirectoryName. Only one of SourceDirectory and SourceDirectoryName is used. SourceDirectory takes precedence. Used in conjunction with SourceFile or SourceFileName.
Can be used as an alternative to SourceDirectory. Only one of SourceDirectory and SourceDirectoryName is used. SourceDirectory takes precedence. Used in conjunction with SourceFile or SourceFileName.
